item.title: APSB24-74: Security update available for Adobe Acrobat and Reader
item.description:
Adobe has released security updates for Adobe Acrobat and Reader. These updates resolve critical and important vulnerabilities that could lead to arbitrary code execution.
Products: Adobe Acrobat DC, Adobe Acrobat Reader DC Severity: Critical
View full advisory: https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/acrobat/apsb24-74.html
item.author: Adobe Security Team
